panels.description: Rozkład RTT klienta w czasie (p50/p95/p99). Pokazuje drift i rozjechanie tail latency bez znajomości etapów wewnętrznych.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  percentile,
  value_ms
FROM (
  SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(eventTime, INTERVAL $__interval_s SECOND) AS time,
    'p50' AS percentile,
    quantileTDigest(0.50)(processorDurationMs) AS value_ms
  FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
  WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
    AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
    AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
  GROUP BY time

  UNION ALL

  SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(eventTime, INTERVAL $__interval_s SECOND) AS time,
    'p95' AS percentile,
    quantileTDigest(0.95)(processorDurationMs) AS value_ms
  FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
  WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
    AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
    AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
  GROUP BY time

  UNION ALL

  SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(eventTime, INTERVAL $__interval_s SECOND) AS time,
    'p99' AS percentile,
    quantileTDigest(0.99)(processorDurationMs) AS value_ms
  FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
  WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
    AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
    AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
  GROUP BY time
)
ORDER BY time, percentile

panels.title: RTT percentiles (p50/p95/p99)

panels.description: Udział transakcji przekraczających progi SLO (1s/2s/5s). Daje szybki obraz jak duży jest tail latency.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  threshold,
  pct
FROM (
  SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(eventTime, INTERVAL $__interval_s SECOND) AS time,
    '>1s' AS threshold,
    avg(if(processorDurationMs > 1000, 1, 0)) * 100 AS pct
  FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
  WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
    AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
    AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
  GROUP BY time

  UNION ALL

  SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(eventTime, INTERVAL $__interval_s SECOND) AS time,
    '>2s' AS threshold,
    avg(if(processorDurationMs > 2000, 1, 0)) * 100 AS pct
  FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
  WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
    AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
    AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
  GROUP BY time

  UNION ALL

  SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(eventTime, INTERVAL $__interval_s SECOND) AS time,
    '>5s' AS threshold,
    avg(if(processorDurationMs > 5000, 1, 0)) * 100 AS pct
  FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
  WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
    AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
    AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
  GROUP BY time
)
ORDER BY time, threshold

panels.title: Tail breach rate by SLO threshold

panels.description: Anomalie RTT: najwyższe zaobserwowane wartości per interwał i segment (typ operacji + protokół).

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toStartOfInterval(eventTime, INTERVAL $__interval_s SECOND) AS time,
  concat(
    multiIf(
      notEmpty(dimensions['transaction_type']), dimensions['transaction_type'],
      notEmpty(dimensions['tx_type']), dimensions['tx_type'],
      notEmpty(dimensions['operation']), dimensions['operation'],
      'unknown'
    ),
    ' | ',
    multiIf(
      notEmpty(dimensions['protocol']), dimensions['protocol'],
      notEmpty(dimensions['channel']), dimensions['channel'],
      notEmpty(dimensions['transport']), dimensions['transport'],
      'unknown'
    )
  ) AS segment,
  max(processorDurationMs) AS max_rtt_ms
FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
  AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
  AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
GROUP BY time, segment
ORDER BY time, segment

panels.title: Max RTT by transaction segment (anomaly view)

panels.description: Najgorsze callId/businessCode w wybranym oknie. Przydatne do triage i szybkiego wskazania dominujących outlierów.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  if(callId = '', 'unknown', callId) AS call_id,
  if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode) AS business_code,
  count() AS txns,
  quantileTDigest(0.95)(processorDurationMs) AS p95_rtt_ms,
  quantileTDigest(0.99)(processorDurationMs) AS p99_rtt_ms,
  max(processorDurationMs) AS max_rtt_ms,
  avg(businessSuccess) * 100 AS business_success_pct
FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
  AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
  AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
GROUP BY call_id, business_code
ORDER BY max_rtt_ms DESC
LIMIT 100

panels.title: Worst callId/businessCode by RTT

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT swarmId FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1 ORDER BY swarmId

list.query: SELECT DISTINCT swarmId FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1 ORDER BY swarmId

list.query: SELECT DISTINCT callId FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1 WHERE callId != '' ORDER BY callId LIMIT 500
